title: Extraction and separation of anthocyanins from Kushui rose by ethanol-(NH4)2SO4 aqueous two-phase system
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21250-21259
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03195D, Paper

Yuanyuan Li, Tongyu Li, Hongxu An, Xinyi Wang, Juan Han, Yun Wang
Simultaneous extraction of anthocyanins and removal of sugars from Kushui rose was performed using an ethanol-ammonium sulphate aqueous two-phase system (ATPS).
